Text:
how do you activate this copy of windows 7 sp1?
is it RTM activated (only 30 days)? or its fully activated? because i have windows 7 with the latest updates and when i installed sp1 it said it wasnt activated and i couldnt find a sp1 activator so i had to remove sp1

please someone give me a proper responce

i have Windows 7 x32 from November with all updates installed and i download SP1 from Windows Update, i remove my old activator and this http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6152434/Windows_7_All_Version__RTM_Activator_-__RedDragon_  doesnt work

is it only for this torrent? i dont want to reinstall Windows 7 just to make it work... please explain to me
